ProjectInfo.ObjectivesDetails: I've had been contracted as a full stack developer to create new products and improving the others.
ProjectInfo.Heading: Challenge
Details: As a Front-End Developer, I am responsible for creating a new web application that involves a variety of modern technologies and features. This project is a multi-faceted endeavor, encompassing the development of real-time web player functionality using WebSockets, and an admin dashboard.
My primary task is to develop, and maintain a new web application from scratch. I use ReactJS as the primary front-end library to create a modern and responsive user interface.
To manage complex application state and asynchronous operations, I employ Redux Saga. This middleware helps in orchestrating data flow and handling real-time events.

I utilize Materialize as a component library to expedite the development process. Materialize offers pre-built, responsive UI components and styling, ensuring a consistent and visually appealing user experience.

One of the core features of the application is a real-time web player that provides live or dynamic content using WebSockets. I implement WebSocket communication to ensure real-time updates and data synchronization between the server and clients.

In addition to the real-time player, I develop an admin dashboard using Laravel for the back end and React for the front end. This dashboard provides administrative control and reporting capabilities.
I focus on creating a responsive design to ensure that the application is accessible and functional on various devices and screen sizes.
I implement security measures and user authentication to protect sensitive data and ensure that only authorized users can access the admin dashboard.
